A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The people upset are the ones attached the the happy-go-lucky\, campy\, unrealistic universe where the hairbrained scheme would always prevail over insurmountable odds. This totally changes the tune of Star Wars but makes you trust the universe in a way that \"putting on a stormtrooper outfit and escaping by the seat of your pants always wins\" never did. It's excellent writing and needs to be commended.
